mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT IDX, PARENT_IDX, NAME, LVL, SORT_ORDER, WRITE_ID, WRITE_DATE, OPEN_YN FROM MENU_TREE WHERE LVL = 1 UNION ALL SELECT IDX, PARENT_IDX, NAME, LVL, SORT_ORDER, WRITE_ID, WRITE_DATE, OPEN_YN FROM MENU_TREE WHERE IDX != PARENT_IDX ) SELECT IDX, PARENT_IDX, NAME, LVL, SORT_ORDER, WRITE_ID, WRITE_DATE, OPEN_YN FROM CTE ORDER BY PARENT_IDX, IDX
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO menu_tree ( IDX, PARENT_IDX, LVL, NAME, LINK, SORT_ORDER, WRITE_ID, CREATE_DATE, OPEN_YN ) VALUES
( #{item.idx}, #{item.parentIdx}, #{item.lvl}, #{item.name}, #{item.link}, #{item.sortOrder}, #{item.writeId}, SYSDATE(), 'Y' )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM menu_tree WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM menu_tree )
